# SSH

### 

Pertama kita buat ssh nya dulu di server app 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/99697182/176064464-d2827181-dd3d-4508-aecc-c13ecc61b58c.png)

kita cek 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/99697182/176064696-cb5cf644-1cbc-4d2f-a680-0ed281e69ce5.png)

jika sudah , maka kita akan menambahkan pub.key nya ke file baru authorized_keys agar dikenali 

```
ssh-rsa  app@app-rahman
```

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/99697182/176064946-e31a834a-ce3d-4b7c-9de1-3d113cd62241.png)

ref : https://jaranguda.com/login-ke-ssh-server-tanpa-password/

setelah ini, kita edit file sshd_config nya

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/99697182/176066400-3e81794a-27ab-4a59-9dbf-660c2fffcc83.png)

kita restart

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/99697182/176066799-f8a0d802-d433-4b23-a893-602b9961aa27.png)

setelah itu kita copy ke seluruh server agar bisa masuk tanpa login

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/99697182/176065223-b9c38f93-74da-4edb-9f7d-ea4e1397dda9.png)

kita cek
